author: fabdarice
content: to add to <@!496267636082999316> question,  will transactions ordering/priorities from the mempool operate in a similar fashion than with EIP-1559, the higher the tip, the higher the priority?

author: djrtwo
content:
After the merge, the way blocks are packed with user TXs will be essentially the same as in Ethereum right before.
If EIP 1559 is implemented prior to the merge, then it will have those rules
If not, it will have essentially the mempool/block rules of today <@!184800644266196992>
